          <title>
            <string language="en">Bending of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dépliement de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dobra da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piegatura della luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάμψη του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flexión de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows a truck veering to the side as it slips off the road into the sand.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen LKW, der zur Seite 
veering ist, während sie weg von der Straße in den Sand gleitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre un camion virant au côté 
pendant qu'elle glisse outre de la route dans le sable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra um caminhão que veering ao 
lado enquanto desliza fora da estrada na areia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra un camion che veering al 
lato mentre slitta fuori della strada nella sabbia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει ένα truck στρέφοντας 
στην πλευρά όπως γλιστρά από το δρόμο στην άμμο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra un carro que vira a la cara 
mientras que se desliza del camino en la arena.</string>
          </description>
